name: 2.4.2.Final
body:
- [**Bug**][**area/references**] Schema not updated when the version of the reference changes [#3203](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3203)
- [**Bug**][**area/compatibility**][**area/storage**][**area/rules**] Schema with enum reference is not compatible with previous version [#3202](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3202)
- [**Bug**][**area/ui**] REGISTRY_UI_FEATURES_READONLY mode isn't readonly [#3193](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3193)
- [**Enhancement**][**Question**] Allow for public read-only console access that bypasses keycloak, but still use keycloak for API access [#3192](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3192)
- [**Bug**][**area/compatibility**][**area/rest-api**][**area/storage**] Schemas with references fail to updated with compatibility mode enabled [#3187](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3187)
- [**Bug**][**component/registry**][**priority/high**][**area/compatibility**][**area/rest-api**][**area/storage**] com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException [#3185](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3185)
- [**Documentation**][**Enhancement**][**area/rest-api**] Document the artifact references feature [#3165](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3165)
- [**Bug**][**area/storage**] New Docker+Postgresql Install throwing PSQLException: ERROR: syntax error at or near "ON" [#3152](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3152)
- [**Bug**][**area/storage**] Apicurio Schema Registry error during boot up -Registry working fine though  [#3143](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3143)
- [**Bug**][**area/storage**] Cannot deserialize value of type `java.util.Date` from String "2023-02-08T15:58:32Z": expected format "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ" [#3140](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3140)
- [**Enhancement**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**][**area/storage**][**area/ccompat-api**] Support for increased number of rows of apis/ccompat/v6/subjects/ | Currently only 1000 Rows possible [#3118](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3118)
- [**Enhancement**][**component/registry**][**priority/high**][**area/references**] Make contentId and contentHash unique per content and references [#3109](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3109)
- [**Documentation**][**Enhancement**] Ensure the supported APIs are listed in the docs [#3091](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3091)
- [**Bug**][**area/serdes**] Serialization Error in 2.4.1.Final ENUM Artifact Reference and RecordId Strategy [#3088](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3088)
- [**Bug**][**area/compatibility**][**area/rest-api**][**area/storage**] How to upload JSON schemas that reference other schemas with $ref [#3086](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3086)
- [**closed**] Support for artifact version deletion [#3074](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3074)
- [**area/storage**][**state/waiting**] Inserting rows manually/externally into DB - how to? [#3065](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3065)
- [**Question**] How to setup as registry for Kafka components [#3059](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3059)
- [**Enhancement**][**area/rest-api**][**area/rules**] Different Authentication/Authorization for Different Use Cases (multiple listeners?) [#3000](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3000)
- [**Enhancement**][**area/storage**] Document High Availability Registry Setup [#2999](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2999)
- [**Bug**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**] `apicurio.registry.check-period-ms` is turned on by default [#2997](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2997)
- [**Bug**][**area/storage**] Fix kafkasql node creation on slow machines with already existing messages. [#2991](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2991)
- [**area/storage**] [new-system-tests] Deploy test of Apicurio Registry with KafkaSQL storage and Keycloak [#2961](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2961)
- [**area/storage**] [new-system-tests] Deploy test of Apicurio Registry with KafkaSQL storage without IAM [#2960](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2960)
- [**Bug**][**area/storage**] No artifact with ID '3227' in group 'null' was found. [#2912](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2912)
- [**Enhancement**][**priority/normal**] Managed service deployment and CI/CD improvements. [#2883](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2883)
- [**Bug**][**component/registry**][**priority/high**][**area/storage**][**area/ccompat-api**][**state/waiting**] ccompat/v6 : delete artifact version provoke inconsistent behavior [#2831](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2831)
- [**Bug**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**][**area/rest-api**] Bug with Registry artifact creation API - ignoring name and description from header param [#2826](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2826)
- [**Bug**][**component/registry**][**priority/high**][**area/storage**] Apicurio 2.0.3 : impossible to get schema where the latest version is disabled. error_code 40402.  [#2790](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2790)
- [**Bug**][**component/registry**][**priority/high**]  Error Timeout trying to lock table with apicurio-registry-mem and Confluent serializer [#2699](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2699)
- [**Discussion**][**component/registry**][**priority/high**] Avro compatibility check does not work correctly for Enum types [#2572](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2572)
- [**Task**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**] Support artifact references in JSON Schema compatibility checker [#2356](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2356)
- [**Bug**][**component/registry**][**priority/high**] Unable to download artifacts with apicurio-registry-maven-plugin (RESTEASY003635) [#2342](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2342)
- [**Question**][**component/registry**] Enabling High Availability [#2307](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2307)
- [**Enhancement**] Need for thread pool for consumers/producers calls [#2199](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2199)
- [**Question**] Compatibility with ksqlDB - path /apis/ccompat/v6/schemas/ids/0 not found [#2151](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2151)
- [**Bug**] fix clustered kafkasql integration tests  [#2080](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2080)
- [**Question**] [Question] Switch Docker image for running registry (due to Docker Hub introduced pull limits) [#2009](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2009)
- [**Enhancement**][**Discussion**] Implement protobuf content canonicalizer [#1971](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1971)
- [**closed**] Debezium CDC with Apicurio Schema Registry (PoC) [#1809](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1809)
- [**Bug**] ExportV1 Util Crashes When Attempting to Export [#1806](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1806)
- [**Bug**] Error messages missing artifact and group names [#1764](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1764)
- [**Bug**] Schema registry failure with artifactId having '-' [#1741](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1741)
- [**Bug**][**2.0.x**][**2.1.x**] Differing column name in h2 vs. PostgreSQL groups table [#1721](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1721)
- [**Enhancement**][**Beginner Friendly**][**Seeking Contribution**] [enhancement] Allow user defined description when creating an artifact version [#1629](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1629)
- [**Bug**] Unable to update OpenAPI Spec using rest api [#1599](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1599)
- [**closed**] InvalidStateStoreException when using Kafka as registry store [#1483](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1483)
- [**2.0.x**] Make registry UI work with multitenancy + authentication [#1313](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1313)
- [**Quality**] Methods that return CompletionStage should not throw exceptions [#1283](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1283)
- [**Task**][**2.0.x**] Include group management in core v2 API [#1274](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1274)
- [**Task**] Encapsulate dependency to com.worldturner.medeia:medeia-validator-jackson [#1159](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1159)
- [**Enhancement**][**Discussion**] Provide an in-memory Registry Service for Tests [#1153](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1153)
- [**Bug**][**Documentation**] The message is 1051237 bytes when serialized which is larger than the maximum request size you have configured with the max.request.size configuration. [#889](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/889)
- [**Documentation**][**Discussion**] Able to set additional Java properties for Docker images [#829](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/829)
- [**Enhancement**] Able to utilize remote Infinispan cluster [#826](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/826)
- [**Discussion**] How to detect changes to schema from outside registry? [#823](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/823)
- [**Enhancement**] Store file name in metadata property [#813](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/813)
- [**Enhancement**][**Impacts Documentation**][**mas**] Add support for Artifact Groupings [#725](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/725)
- [**Question**][**Discussion**] Clarification on available communication channels [#690](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/690)
- [**Bug**] referenced schemas in ccompat endpoint is not supported?  [#586](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/586)
- [**Bug**] [Streams 1.1.x] ArithmeticException: / by zero [#304](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/304)
- [**closed**] Implement serdes support for Kafka Connect schemas [#181](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/181)
- [**closed**] SAML support? [#2729](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2729)
